attributes.action: Abolish the tiered minimum wage system and give living wage across the board
attributes.additional_details: With the cost of living on the rise, younger people who don’t earn as much are being disproportionately affected compared to older groups. It’s a dangerous time to be living in, considering. Everyone deserves a fair chance at life and having tiered minimum wages flies directly in the face of that.
attributes.background: The tiered minimum wage system puts young people who are out of education or estranged in a very precarious position, financially speaking. Many of us have to just scrape by or work 2 jobs just in order to live comfortably. I want every worker to have a guarantee of a living wage.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618790
